title: e-Learning Design Team Process Competency Enhancement Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in basic online education administration and possession of mathematical domain knowledge
context.additional_context: Corporate mathematics-based job training leadership programs for designated practitioners, conducted in provided digital device environments

learning_goals: Participants can analyze cognitive/social interactions occurring in e-learning design processes to develop team collaboration strategies
Participants can identify and resolve at least three problems encountered in online mathematics education design using an activity-based approach
Participants can derive at least five patterns of e-learning team design processes through case analysis practice
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
